class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        horizontalCut.sort(reverse=True)
        verticalCut.sort(reverse=True)
        total = 0
        h_seg = 1
        v_seg = 1
        h_point = 0
        v_point = 0
        while h_point < len(horizontalCut) and v_point < len(verticalCut):
            if horizontalCut[h_point] > verticalCut[v_point]:
                total += horizontalCut[h_point] * v_seg
                h_seg += 1
                h_point += 1
            else:
                total += verticalCut[v_point] * h_seg
                v_seg += 1
                v_point += 1
        while h_point < len(horizontalCut):
            total += horizontalCut[h_point] * v_seg
            h_point += 1
        while v_point < len(verticalCut):
            total += verticalCut[v_point] * h_seg
            v_point += 1
        return total
